import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../Css/Home.css' import { GlobalContext } from '../Hooks/GlobalContext' import Card from './Card' const Home = () => { const contexto = React.useContext(GlobalContext) const dadosHome = React.createRef() function handleClick() { contexto.setHeight(dadosHome.current.offsetHeight) } handleClick() return
